snippet: James Reede III first followed Champions Tour pro Loren Roberts as a fan. Then Roberts gave $70,000 to Reede’s high school.
abstract: Professional golfer Loren Roberts and junior James Reede III are paired together at the Nature Valley First Tee Open, a pro-junior event that gives developing golfers a chance to compete with Champions Tour players.
lead_paragraph: James Reede III first followed Champions Tour pro Loren Roberts as a fan. Then Roberts gave $70,000 to Reede’s high school.

headline.seo: Student’s Relationship with Senior Pro Goes Beyond Golf
headline.main: Bonding of a First Tee Golfer and One Pro Began Long Ago
headline.print_headline: Bonding of a First Tee Golfer And One Pro Began Long Ago
